sourcesContent:
// src/components/DocumentCard.tsx import React from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" interface DocumentProps { doc: { id: number | string title: string description: string fileType: string fileSize: string tags: string[] author: string authorAvatar?: string downloads: number rating: number icon: string iconClass: string } } const DocumentCard: React.FC = ({ doc }) => { return (
{doc.fileType} {doc.fileSize}

{doc.title}

{doc.description}

{doc.tags.slice(0, 3).map((tag) => ( {tag} ))}
{doc.author}
{doc.downloads}
{doc.rating}
) } export default DocumentCard
